name: Hanu-Droid
author: Varun Verma

sections.description:
Hanu-Droid plugin allows you to convert your word press blog into an Android Native app for free.
After you install the plugin, visit: https://hanu-droid.varunverma.org for more details and to get your free Android app.

With this plugin, you can send push notifications to your app users whenever you add / update any post. To send push notifications, go to the settings – Hanu-Droid Settings and Send notifications.
sections.installation:
The installation is very easy. Just follow the below steps:

  1. Upload Hanu-Droid folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
2.7

Update : Bug fixes.
Option to send data in JSON Format also

2.5.2

Update : Push notification managment updated to HTTPS

2.0

DB access using PDO.
Support for UTF8MB4
Post Utility Function

1.5.2

Added feature to request sync of specific categories – this is controlled from the mobile.
Removed the Option to send a notification message – The notification message is build automatically now.
New feature – Option to send a notification message

1.4

Added support to rate posts via mobile in offline mode.
Added category filter

1.0

This is the first version.
